content: take a stroll through the rose garden in this intricate lace look sun hat stop and smell the roses for a while before sipping a delightful cup of afternoon tea this pattern has been carefully written with detailed and clear instructions it should be relatively easy to work up even though it appears to be a complicated masterpiece you are welcome to sell the items you make with this pattern but please give me krazy kabbage a mention in your sales listing and provide a link to my website www krazykabbage com yarn bee bamboo-tiful light 50% cotton 50% viscose from bamboo in linen 257 yards you will need crochet hook size g 4 0mm and a yarn needle to weave in ends gauge 18 single_crochet x 20 row = 4 this pattern uses us terminology stitches and terms used magic_ring chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch
